item.title: Stocks fall after Trump's DOJ opens criminal probe into Powell
item.description: Powell rebuked the probe as an effort to undermine the Fed's independence.

item.title: Ex-husband charged with aggravated murder in slaying of Ohio couple due in court
item.description: A man is due in court on Monday for allegedly gunning down his ex-wife and her husband in their Ohio home over the holidays, authorities said.

item.title: WATCH: Guide dog and vision-impaired owner are on a travel mission
item.description: ABC News' Danny New reports on two best pals who are turning heads at National Parks across the country -- one on two legs.

item.title: Pope Leo XIV meets with Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has met with Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado at the Vatican

item.title: WATCH: Wildfires rage in Australia
item.description: Nearly 900,000 acres have burned in the past days as the country bakes in a record-setting heatwave.
